vela.problem: Need a scalable, multi-portal logistics platform for internal and external users with independent deployment and tenant isolation.
vela.solution: Architected Micro Frontend (Nx, host + remotes) for Core, Customer, and Supplier portals; multi-tenant config; CI/CD with Docker and Kubernetes.
vela.impact: 60+ person program; 3 portals; parallel team development and stable releases.

sogus.problem: Online examination platform requiring flexible test formats and scalable frontend for a 10-person team.
sogus.solution: Led frontend design with Angular and React/Next.js; built flows for creating tests, assigning exams, and reviewing results.
sogus.impact: Unified exam lifecycle; collaboration with stakeholders on requirements and technical solutions.

medbuy.problem: E-commerce for pharmaceutical supply chain with responsive UX and reliable backend integration.
medbuy.solution: Developed responsive UIs in React and Next.js; integrated APIs; containerized deployment with Docker.
medbuy.impact: Improved usability and alignment with UX/UI design; production-ready deployment.

kensa.problem: Order and revenue management with Admin and Customer portals and payment integration.
kensa.solution: Fullstack order system with Laravel REST APIs; integrated VNPay and Payoo; deployed on Linux with Docker.
kensa.impact: End-to-end order processing and reporting; live payment flows.

kilu.problem: Marketplace for used motorbikes with listing, search, and transaction workflows.
kilu.solution: Custom WordPress features, theme and plugin customization; performance and SEO optimization.
kilu.impact: Key pages ranked; marketplace workflows supported.
